description:
Yoshikage Kira was the killer hiding in Morioh and is also a Stand user. Shigechi finds out this secret, so Kira tries to dispose of him, but Shigechi fights back with Harvest. However, because of Kira`s Stand, Deadly Queen, he suffers a mortal wound and loses. Shigechi manages to get away from Kira and tries to find Josuke so he can tell him about Kira and be fixed by Shining Diamond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kira Yoshikage wa Shizuka ni Kurashitai: Sono 2
Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
吉良吉影は静かに暮らしたい その2
